shortcuts: Nirlauncher - Run over 200 freeware utilities from nirsoft.net
NirSoft/AppCrashView - Displays the details of all application crashes occurred in your system
NirSoft/AdapterWatch - displays useful information about your network adapters
NirSoft/ActiveXHelper - view essential information about ActiveX components installed on your computer
NirSoft/BatteryInfoView - Displays battery information on laptops and netbooks
NirSoft/BluetoothLogView - Creates a log of Bluetooth activity in your area
NirSoft/BluetoothView - Monitors the activity of Bluetooth devices around you
NirSoft/ChromeCookiesView - Alternative to the standard internal cookies viewer of Google Chrome
NirSoft/ChromeHistoryView - View the browsing history of Chrome Web browser
NirSoft/ChromePass - Password recovery tool for Google Chrome Web browser
NirSoft/CleanAfterMe - Clean files and Registry values in your system
NirSoft/Clipboardic - Small and simple clipboard manager
NirSoft/ControlMyMonitor - View and modify the settings of your monitor
NirSoft/CountryTraceRoute - Fast Traceroute utility with IP country information
NirSoft/CurrProcess - Displays the list of all processes currently running on your system
NirSoft/CustomizeIE - Add,delete toolbar buttons and menu items in Internet Explorer
NirSoft/CustomExplorerToolbar - Add Copy,Cut,Paste buttons to the Explorer toolbar of Windows 7
NirSoft/Dialupass - Recovers Dial-Up passwords in all versions of Windows
NirSoft/DiskCountersView - Show disk drive read,write counters
NirSoft/DiskSmartView - Retrieves S.M.A.R.T information from IDE,SATA disks
NirSoft/DNSDataView - Retrieve the DNS records (MX, NS, A, SOA) of the specified domains
NirSoft/DomainHostingView - Displays extensive information about a domain
NirSoft/DotNetResourcesExtract - Extract embedded resources from .NET applications
NirSoft/DownTester - Test your Internet download speed
NirSoft/ESEDatabaseView - View the content of ESE database files (.edb files)
NirSoft/ExecutedProgramsList - Displays programs and batch files that you previously executed on your system
NirSoft/ExifDataView - Displays the Exif data stored inside .jpg image files
NirSoft/FastResolver - Resolves multiple host names into IP addresses,MAC Addresses and vice versa
NirSoft/FavoritesView - displays the list of all your Favorties,bookmarks in a single page
NirSoft/FBCacheView - Shows Facebook images stored in the cache of your Web browser
NirSoft/FirefoxDownloadsView - Displayed the list of downloaded files in Firefox
NirSoft/FlashCookiesView - View Flash cookies stored in your computer
NirSoft/HostedNetworkStarter - Create a wifi hotspot with your wireless network adapter
NirSoft/HotKeysList - Displays the list of hot keys that are currently registered on your system
NirSoft/HTMLAsText - Converts HTML documents to simple text files
NirSoft/IconsExtract - Extract icons and cursors from executbale files (EXE, DLL, OCX, CPL,  etc.)
NirSoft/IECacheView - List all files currently stored in the cache of Internet Explorer
NirSoft/IECookiesView - Displays the cookies that Internet Explorer stores on your computer
NirSoft/IEHistoryView - Displays the list of Web sites that you visited with IE Web browser
NirSoft/IE PassView - Recover passwords stored by Internet Explorer (Versions 4.0 - 8.0)
NirSoft/ImageCacheViewer - Displays images stored in the cache of your Web browsers
NirSoft/InsideClipboard - Displays the content of all formats stored in the clipboard
NirSoft/IPInfoOffline - view country information about IP addresses
NirSoft/IPNetInfo - Easily find all available information about IP address
NirSoft/JumpListsView - Displays the information stored by the 'Jump Lists' feature of Windows 7
NirSoft/LastActivityView - View the latest computer activity
NirSoft/LiveContactsView - View the details of all contacts in your Windows Live Messenger
NirSoft/MonitorInfoView - displays essential information about your monitor
NirSoft/MZCacheView - List all files currently stored in the cache of Firefox,Mozilla browser
NirSoft/MessenPass - Recovers the passwords of instant messenger programs
NirSoft/MUICacheView - Edit,delete MUICache items in your system
NirSoft/MetarWeather - Decode METAR weather reports, and display them in a simple weather report table

NirSoft/NetRouteView - GUI alternative to the standard route utility of Windows
